post:
**Apologies if you just had to wipe your glasses...clean your mind whilst you're at it! ;-)**

![](https://cablechief.com/clients/assets/img/logo.jpg)

What's the point in having a big disk if you can't use it!? We listened LET, we've taken the handcuffs off the headboard so now you can go crazy, tiger. Our KVM plans are better than ever with unmetered incoming bandwidth and no extra restrictions*.

Node Specs:

`2x Intel Xeon L5630
96GB DDR3 RAM
20x2TB RE4 HDDs in Hardware RAID-6 with BBU`

Let's get down to business here are the plans:

`1GB RAM
250GB HDD
1 CPU Core (fair share)
1TB Outgoing (Server - Internet) Bandwidth @ 1Gbps (fair share)
Unmetered Incoming (Internet - Server) Bandwidth @ 1Gbps (fair share)
$4.99/mo
KVM` <a href="https://cablechief.com/clients/cart.php?a=add&pid=7">Order now!</a>

`2GB RAM
500GB HDD
2 CPU Cores (fair share)
2TB Outgoing (Server - Internet) Bandwidth @ 1Gbps (fair share)
Unmetered Incoming (Internet - Server) Bandwidth @ 1Gbps (fair share)
$6.99/mo
KVM` <a href="https://cablechief.com/clients/cart.php?a=add&pid=8">Order now!</a>

*You must still obey the <a href="https://cablechief.com/tosaup.html">AUP</a>, please give it a read, it helps everyone! Legal torrenting is a-ok, dicking around with I/O and DMCA requests won't make you very popular.

All VPS plans come with 1 IPv4 address (extra $1.50/month) and /112 (65,535) IPv6 addresses. SolusVM Control Panel, custom ISOs on request (up to 24hr lead time), no Windows allowed.

Want to test the network? Go ahead!

`Network provided by GorillaServers, Ogden, Utah. 
Test IP: gs0.cablechief.com
Test file (1GB): gs0.cablechief.com/1gb.bin`

We accept PayPal and Stripe (inc Alipay). All VPSs are provisioned instantly upon payment dependent on IP availability/fraud screening.

Cable Chief Limited, registered in England and Wales (10077923)
